content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the cube root of, 5 times x squared, minus 7, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mroot><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 10 x over 3, end fraction, times open parenthesis, 5 times x squared, minus 7, close parenthesis, raised to the negative two thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third times open parenthesis, 5 times x squared, minus 7, close parenthesis, raised to the negative two thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="three fourths times open parenthesis, 5 times x squared, minus 7, close parenthesis, raised to the four thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third times open parenthesis, 10 x, close parenthesis, raised to the negative two thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 10 x over 3, end fraction, times open parenthesis, 5 times x squared, minus 7, close parenthesis, raised to the negative two thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
